body:
#### PR description:

As suggested earlier in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27153#issuecomment-501324699, I'm refactoring the logging in PFAlgo to be thread-safe. This is a first commit to let you know I'm working on this and to get initial feedback. I hope to revamp the whole PFAlgo.cc from the logging point of view (also removing useless comments etc) in the next few days.

#### PR validation:

WIP, please don't trigger tests yet on this PR.
title: PFAlgo thread-safe logging
